text:
I feel that the search field is too small (specially if you use long selector for CSS etc.) so if you wanna tweak it and you have a custom CSS injector this is for you:
`.CodeMirror-dialog.CodeMirror-dialog-top input{`
`      width: calc(100% - 400px) !important;`
`}`

if you noticed also the font size changing is because I tweaked it too:
`.CodeMirror.CodeMirror-overlayscroll.cm-s-HubSpot-canvas-dark{`
`  font-size: 15px !important;`
`}`
I use it when I am working on my laptop screen only (which has 3k resolution on 17'' and Windows zooming have some issues scaling)

I think I have found an issue:
- CM converted to global module (from a template to save the default content)
- Cloned to a different portal
- CM rolled back to local CM.

Now in the content editor (email/page publisher) there are no options/fields to edit the content
Hey <@U7ADCU3BM>, we're actually nearing completion of a much improved find/replace dialog. You should see it as early as next week.

I was asked to post this here:
we are still seeing a blank folder issue when cloning templates
- example 1: <https://app.HubSpot.com/file-manager-beta/3699194/folder/>
- example 2: <https://app.HubSpot.com/file-manager-beta/4444857/>
  - this particular portal is one we had already added a name to the folder previously and it created another blank one when we cloned another template

cmd clicking multiple modules to copy to a new portal doesnâ€™t actually make it so you can send multiple modules, just takes one of the modules
<https://spin.d.pr/33FylZ+>
also it appears if you go to copy a module but choose to exclude an asset such as an image it fails to copy the  whole module.

:wave: Are you sure these are the right links? These links are to the file manager. If you could send a screencast that would be super helpful. If not, no problem, but if you could confirm the links that would really helpful. Thanks!
